badges.title: Rust Over Radio – KE5LVX Protocol
badges.description: Awarded for successfully transmitting RustChain validator proof or network packet over amateur radio to the internet. Because hams built the world.

emotional_resonance.trigger: Packet proof or chain sync transmitted via ham radio relay

badges.visual_anchor: rusted Yaesu rig with validator glyphs on green CRT, Morse echo in the flame
